# shared-discord-types

This lib is for custom types to be used with discord.js. They are general so that they could be potentially useful for any discord bot. Types to be used with discord.js but that are specific to a particular bot should be in a separate lib.

## Nx auto-generated

This library was generated with [Nx](https://nx.dev).

## Building

Run `nx build shared-discord-types` to build the library.

## Running unit tests

Run `nx test shared-discord-types` to execute the unit tests via [Jest](https://jestjs.io).
